title: Tactility: App-Based OS for Your ESP32
author: Electromos Team
description: Ditch monolithic firmware and bring a smartphone-like experience to your ESP32 projects. Tactility is a modern, open-source OS that runs apps dynamically from an SD card, making your creations modular, stable, and easy to update.
subheading: Meet Tactility: The App-Based Operating System for Your ESP32
